clean_content:
Definition / general

* Abscess containing brightly eosinophilic, pseudomycotic structures composed of necrotic debris and immunoglobulin in starburst pattern* In U.S., usually due to *Staphylococcus aureus* or *Pseudomonas aeruginosa*; in tropics, due to schistosomiasis, microfilariae, various fungi

Case reports

* 61 year old woman with CLL for 10 years with *Nocardia asteroides* in spleen
  ([Arch Pathol Lab Med 2001;125:1515](11698021))
